events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a streetlight on April 30th at 8 PM.
The claim was assigned to the Auto Accident cluster after review of the initial report and damage description.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the vehicle collision claim and will coordinate next steps promptly.
The customer received confirmation of claim acknowledgment and was informed about the documentation required.
The following documents were requested: police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed photos of the collision.
An investigation into the car accident was opened to assess liability and extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault and damage is covered.
A settlement offer was proposed covering vehicle repair costs and a rental car for the repair duration.
Customer responded positively appreciating the fair settlement offer and the responsive agent support.
Claim was officially approved with authorization to proceed with repair and rental reimbursement.
Payment for car repairs was issued timely to the repair shop as per the approved settlement terms.
The claim was successfully closed after repair completion and final customer confirmation of satisfaction.
